Actions.Text: AMEND AND RECOMMIT TO GOVERNMENTAL OPERATIONS

Title: Relates to requiring consent of a minor's parent, legal guardian or attorney for law enforcement collection of DNA from certain minors
Summary: Requires the written consent of a minor's parent, legal guardian or attorney for law enforcement collection of DNA from a minor and/or pick up of a discarded sample of a minor prior to the lawful arrest of such minor.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law, in relation to requiring consent of a minor's parent, legal guardian or attorney for law enforcement collection of DNA from certain minors
